column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Chicken torta: THE BREAD WAS SO DELICIOUS! The chicken was not very well seasoned but the toppings (crema
column3: jalapenos) made the sandwich yummy. The two pieces of iceberg(?) lettuce on the sandwich were very sad. I just couldn't get over the telera bread they used
column4: I would eat that by itself haha.
